meta.description: Titer tests can be performed to determine a dog's immunity to distemper, parvovirus and adenovirus; and a cat's immunity to panleukopenia.

title: The Only Sure Way to Know if Your Pet Is Immune to Disease
cleaned_text: Some in the conventional veterinary community are working to encourage their peers to be more open to antibody titer testing in lieu of repeated re-vaccinations of cats and dogs

opengraph.title: The Only Sure Way to Know if Your Pet Is Immune to Disease
opengraph.description: Titer tests can be performed to determine a dog's immunity to distemper, parvovirus and adenovirus; and a cat's immunity to panleukopenia.
